task.title: Chamfer Polylines and Polyline Segments
task.shortdesc: You can create a chamfer line for two segments of a polyline that are adjacent or separated by no more than one arc segment. As shown in the illustration, if they separated by an arc segment, the arc is deleted and replaced with a chamfer line.

context.p: To chamfer selected vertices in a polyline

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Chamfer from the mainmenu.
Select the polyline along the segment where you want to begin the chamfer.

step.info: Select the polyline along the segment where you want to end the chamfer.

result.p: Select the polyline along the (A) and (B) segments
